Segment.name: CSC
Segment.comment: To provide a mechanism for exchanging certificates of authority, public keys and associated information in an X12 format

Field.name: CryptographicManagementPurpose
Field.comment: The stated business purpose for exchanging public key on certificate information with a trading partner

Field.name: SecurityOriginatorName
Field.comment: Unique designation (identity) of the cryptographic process that performs authentication or encryption on data to be interchanged, or originates a cryptographic service message Note: X9 has a minimum length of 4 characters for the security originator; no mechanism, or registration method is provided by X9 or X12 to guarantee the uniqueness of the identifier

Field.name: SecurityRecipientName
Field.comment: Unique designation (identity) of the cryptographic process that performs authentication or decryption on received data, or is the destination of a cryptographic service message Note: X9 has a minimum length of 4 characters for the security recipient; no mechanism, or registration method is provided by X9 or X12 to guarantee the uniqueness of the identifier

Field.name: CertificateLookUpInformation
Field.comment: Conveys the information related to or used for certificate identification

Field.name: ReferenceIdentifier
Field.comment: To identify one or more reference numbers or identification numbers as specified by the Reference Qualifier

Field.name: FilterIdCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of filter used to convert data code values

Field.name: VersionIdentifier
Field.comment: Revision level of a particular format, program, technique or algorithm

Field.name: LengthOfData
Field.comment: Length of data is the number of character positions of the compressed or encrypted/filtered text; when data is plain text, this field shall be absent
